001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.nio.file.Paths;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
010
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.DefaultOutputRegistry.StandardLogOutputProvider;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutputBuilder;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.ListLogOutput;
015
016/**
017 * Register output providers by URI scheme.
018 */
019public sealed interface LogOutputRegistry extends OutputProvider permits DefaultOutputRegistry {
020
021        /**
022         * A meta URI scheme to reference outputs registered somewhere else.
023         */
024        public static String NAMED_OUTPUT_SCHEME = "name";
025
026        /**
027         * The URI scheme for list provider.
028         */
029        public static String LIST_OUTPUT_SCHEME = "list";
030
031        /**
032         * Register a provider by {@link URI#getScheme() scheme}.
033         * @param scheme URI scheme to match for.
034         * @param provider provider for scheme.
035         */
036        public void register(String scheme, OutputProvider provider);
037
038        /**
039         * Finds an output by name.
040         * @param name output name.
041         * @return maybe an output.
042         */
043        Optional<LogOutput> output(String name);
044
045        /**
046         * Registers an output by name for lookup.
047         * @param name name assigned to output.
048         * @param output for name.
049         */
050        public void register(String name, LogOutput output);
051
052        /**
053         * Default output provider.
054         * @return default output provider.
055         */
056        public static LogOutputRegistry of() {
057                var r = new DefaultOutputRegistry();
058                for (var p : StandardLogOutputProvider.values()) {
059                        r.register(p.scheme(), p);
060                }
061                return r;
062        }
063
064}
065
066final class DefaultOutputRegistry implements LogOutputRegistry {
067
068        private final Map<String, LogOutput> outputs = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
069
070        private final Map<String, OutputProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
071
072        @Override
073        public void register(String scheme, OutputProvider provider) {
074                providers.put(scheme, provider);
075        }
076
077        @Override
078        public void register(String name, LogOutput output) {
079                _register(name, output);
080        }
081
082        private LogOutput _register(String name, LogOutput output) {
083                if (outputs.putIfAbsent(name, output) != null) {
084                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Name is already in use. name = '%s'".formatted("name"));
085                }
086                return output;
087        }
088
089        @Override
090        public Optional<LogOutput> output(String name) {
091                return Optional.ofNullable(outputs.get(name));
092        }
093
094        // LogOutput provide(String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
095        // var o = output(name).orElse(null);
096        // if (o != null) {
097        // return o;
098        // }
099        // return provide(URI.create(name + ":///"), name, properties);
100        // }
101
102        private static URI normalize(URI uri) {
103                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
104                String path = uri.getPath();
105                String query = uri.getRawQuery();
106                if (scheme == null) {
107                        if (path == null) {
108                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
109                        }
110                        if (path.startsWith("./")) {
111                                uri = Paths.get(path).toUri();
112                        }
113                        else {
114                                uri = URI.create(path + ":///");
115                        }
116                }
117                else if (scheme.equals("file")) {
118                        if (path.startsWith("/./")) {
119                                path = path.substring(1);
120                        }
121                        uri = Paths.get(path).toUri();
122                        if (query != null) {
123                                uri = URI.create(uri.toString() + "?" + query);
124                        }
125                }
126                return uri;
127        }
128
129        @Override
130        public LogOutput provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
131                uri = normalize(uri);
132                String scheme = Objects.requireNonNull(uri.getScheme());
133                OutputProvider customProvider = providers.get(scheme);
134                if (customProvider == null) {
135                        throw new IOException("Output for uri: " + uri + " not found.");
136                }
137                return _register(name, customProvider.provide(uri, name, properties));
138        }
139
140        enum StandardLogOutputProvider implements LogOutput.OutputProvider {
141
142                STDOUT {
143                        @Override
144                        public LogOutput provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
145                                return new StdOutOutput();
146                        }
147
148                        @Override
149                        public String scheme() {
150                                return LogOutput.STDOUT_SCHEME;
151                        }
152
153                },
154                STDERR {
155                        @Override
156                        public LogOutput provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
157                                return new StdErrOutput();
158                        }
159
160                        @Override
161                        public String scheme() {
162                                return LogOutput.STDERR_SCHEME;
163                        }
164
165                },
166                LIST {
167                        @Override
168                        public LogOutput provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
169                                return new ListLogOutput();
170                        }
171
172                        @Override
173                        public String scheme() {
174                                return LIST_OUTPUT_SCHEME;
175                        }
176
177                },
178                FILE {
179                        @Override
180                        public LogOutput provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws IOException {
181                                FileOutputBuilder b = new FileOutputBuilder(name);
182                                LogProperties combined;
183                                if (uri.getQuery() != null) {
184                                        combined = LogProperties.of(uri, b.propertyPrefix(), properties);
185                                        String s = uri.toString();
186                                        int index = s.indexOf('?');
187                                        s = s.substring(0, index);
188                                        uri = URI.create(s);
189                                        uri = Paths.get(uri).toUri();
190                                }
191                                else {
192                                        combined = properties;
193                                }
194                                b.uri(uri);
195                                b.fromProperties(combined);
196                                return b.build();
197                        }
198
199                        @Override
200                        public String scheme() {
201                                return LogOutput.FILE_SCHEME;
202                        }
203                };
204
205                public abstract String scheme();
206
207        }
208
209}
